revised_title: Liminal Brightness Increment for White Light: Effects of Foveal and Parafoveal Retina Conditions
tldr: This study investigates the liminal brightness increment for white light under various conditions of the foveal and parafoveal retina. The researchers examined uniform background brightness, uniform surround brightness, and isolated bright patches, finding that these factors significantly affect the liminal brightness increment. The findings provide insights into how the human eye perceives brightness and color under different conditions.
